installOptionsTemplate.content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: managed-addon-options-osc
  namespace: kube-system
data:
  odfDeploy: "true" #Automatically deploy ODF on enabling addon
  monSize: 20Gi #Select mon size here, Required
  monStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select mon storage class name here, Required
  monDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for mon pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select mon device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  osdSize: 250Gi #Select osd size here, Required
  osdStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select osd storage class name here, Required
  osdDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for OSD pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select osd device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  numOfOsd: "1" #Optional (Default is 1)
  workerNodes: all #Select Worker nodes for OCS, Optional
  ocsUpgrade: "false" #Optional
  clusterEncryption: "false" #Set to true if you want cluster wide encryption
  billingType: "advanced" #Billing type. Choose between advanced and essentials

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: managed-addon-options-osc
  namespace: kube-system
data:
  odfDeploy: "true" #Automatically deploy ODF on enabling addon
  osdSize: 250Gi #Select osd size here, Required
  osdStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select osd storage class name here, Required
  osdDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for OSD pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select osd device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  numOfOsd: "1" #Optional (Default is 1)
  workerNodes: all #Select Worker nodes for OCS, Optional
  ocsUpgrade: "false" #Optional
  clusterEncryption: "false" #Set to true if you want cluster wide encryption
  billingType: "advanced" #Billing type. Choose between advanced and essentials
  autoDiscoverDevices: "false" #Set to true if automatically discovering local disks

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: managed-addon-options-osc
  namespace: kube-system
data:
  odfDeploy: "true" #Automatically deploy ODF on enabling addon
  osdSize: 250Gi #Select osd size here, Required
  osdStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select osd storage class name here, Required
  osdDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for OSD pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select osd device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  numOfOsd: "1" #Optional (Default is 1)
  workerNodes: all #Select Worker nodes for OCS, Optional
  ocsUpgrade: "false" #Optional
  clusterEncryption: "false" #Set to true if you want cluster wide encryption
  billingType: "advanced" #Billing type. Choose between advanced and essentials
  autoDiscoverDevices: "false" #Set to true if automatically discovering local disks

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: managed-addon-options-osc
  namespace: kube-system
data:
  odfDeploy: "true" #Automatically deploy ODF on enabling addon
  osdSize: 250Gi #Select osd size here, Required
  osdStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select osd storage class name here, Required
  osdDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for OSD pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select osd device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  numOfOsd: "1" #Optional (Default is 1)
  workerNodes: all #Select Worker nodes for OCS, Optional
  ocsUpgrade: "false" #Optional
  clusterEncryption: "false" #Set to true if you want cluster wide encryption
  billingType: "advanced" #Billing type. Choose between advanced and essentials
  autoDiscoverDevices: "false" #Set to true if automatically discovering local disks
  hpcsEncryption: "false" #Set to true if HPCS Encryption need to enable
  hpcsServiceName: <Please provide the KMS Service instance name> # Provide the HPCS instance name if hpcsEncryption enabled true, Optional
  hpcsInstanceId: <Please provide the KMS Service instance ID> # Provide the HPCS instance id if hpcsEncryption enabled true, Optional
  hpcsSecretName: <Please provide the KMS secret name> # Provide secret name created with HPCS keys, Optional
  hpcsBaseUrl: <Please provide the KMS Base (public) URL> # Provide HPCS Base URL from HPCS instance, Optional
  hpcsTokenUrl: <Please provide the KMS token URL> # Provide HPCS token URL from HPCS instance, Optional
  ignoreNoobaa: "false" #Set to true if you do not want MultiCloudGateway

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: managed-addon-options-osc
  namespace: kube-system
data:
  odfDeploy: "true" #Automatically deploy ODF on enabling addon
  osdSize: 250Gi #Select osd size here, Required
  osdStorageClassName: ibmc-vpc-block-metro-10iops-tier #Select osd storage class name here, Required
  osdDevicePaths: <Please provide IDs of the disks to be used for OSD pods if using local disks or standard classic cluster> #Select osd device path here (Disk-by-id), Optional
  numOfOsd: "1" #Optional (Default is 1)
  workerNodes: all #Select Worker nodes for OCS, Optional
  ocsUpgrade: "false" #Optional
  clusterEncryption: "false" #Set to true if you want cluster wide encryption
  billingType: "advanced" #Billing type. Choose between advanced and essentials
  autoDiscoverDevices: "false" #Set to true if automatically discovering local disks
  hpcsEncryption: "false" #Set to true if HPCS Encryption need to enable
  hpcsServiceName: <Please provide the KMS Service instance name> # Provide the HPCS instance name if hpcsEncryption enabled true, Optional
  hpcsInstanceId: <Please provide the KMS Service instance ID> # Provide the HPCS instance id if hpcsEncryption enabled true, Optional
  hpcsSecretName: <Please provide the KMS secret name> # Provide secret name created with HPCS keys, Optional
  hpcsBaseUrl: <Please provide the KMS Base (public) URL> # Provide HPCS Base URL from HPCS instance, Optional
  hpcsTokenUrl: <Please provide the KMS token URL> # Provide HPCS token URL from HPCS instance, Optional
  ignoreNoobaa: "false" #Set to true if you do not want MultiCloudGateway
